snippet.title: 「The MISSING: J.J. Macfield and the Island of Memories」Official Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
The MISSING: J.J. Macfield and the Island of Memories is an action-adventure game coming soon to PlayStation®4, Nintendo Switch™, Xbox One, and Steam.

This gameplay trailer includes new information that will shed some light on the mysteries surrounding the game. You'll also get a look at its unique world and characters!


--------------------------------------------------------------------------------

PlayStation®4/Nintendo Switch™/Xbox One/Steamにて配信予定の
アクションアドベンチャーゲーム「The MISSING - J.J.マクフィールドと追憶島 -」。

本映像では本作が醸し出す独特の世界観や登場キャラクター、ゲーム内映像など、
謎に包まれていた新情報が徐々に明らかになって来たぞ！

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------


▼The MISSING - J.J.マクフィールドと追憶島 - 公式サイト / The MISSING: J.J. Macfield and the Island of Memories Official Site
https://www.arcsystemworks.jp/missing
